short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Connect your CRM to Cisco Finesse Contact Center platform.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
INTENDED FOR ENTERPRISE USE ONLY
Compatible with 2Ring Gadgets for Cisco Finesse versions:
  - 3.5.0
---------------------------------------------------------------

2Ring Extension for Cisco Finesse enhances the reach of 2Ring Gadgets for Cisco Finesse to 3rd party web applications running in Google Chrome.

The Extension enables the communication of 2Ring Gadgets and thus of Cisco Finesse with various CRM systems and with many other websites and web-based systems. 

CRM systems natively supported by the Extension include
 - Salesforce Sales Cloud
 - MS Dynamics CRM 2013
 - MS Dynamics CRM 2015
 - MS Dynamics CRM 2016
 - MS Dynamics CRM 365 (Online)
 - MS Dynamics CRM 365 (On-Premises)
 - ServiceNow (Istanbul, Jakarta)
